Title: Prohibits insurers from cancelling renters' insurance based on the ownership of a specific breed of dog
Summary: Prohibits insurers issuing policies insuring personal injury and property damage arising out of a lease, from cancelling or refusing to issue or renew such a policy, or charging increased premiums based upon the harboring of a specific breed of dog on the premises.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to prohibiting insurers from cancelling, refusing to issue or renew renters' insurance based on the breed of dog owned
